metadata.title: CVE-2024-35264 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
.NET and Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-35264` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aspnetcore-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
aspnetcore-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-apphost-pack-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-host-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-hostfxr-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-sdk-8.0 - 8.0.107-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-sdk-8.0-source-built-artifacts - 8.0.107-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-templates-8.0 - 8.0.107-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-8.0 - 8.0.107-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet8 - 8.0.107-8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dotnet7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
dotnet8 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.107-8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1').
dotnet8 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.107-8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1').
dotnet8 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.107-8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1').
